feed.title: App Store Discounts（TW）
feed.subtitle: App Store Discounts - Made with love by appstore-discounts(https://github.com/appstore-discounts/appstore-discounts) feedId:73536236398899200+userId:73658201673997312 feedId:157008546980077568+userId:73658201673997312

entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Wipr 2
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$150.00 → $90.00 [$90.00 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$90.00

App 內購買

  • Yearly Recurring Tip：$320.00
  • Monthly Recurring Tip：$60.00
  • Mega Tip：$690.00
  • Tip：$150.00

应用描述

Wipr blocks ads, popups, trackers, cookie warnings, and other nasty things that make the web slow and ugly. Websites in Safari will look clean, load fast, and stop invisibly tracking you. You’ll notice significant improvements to your battery life and data usage. Setup is a snap. Wipr’s blocklist is updated twice a week automatically, and has enhanced versions for the following languages: Chinese, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Thai, and Vietnamese. Wipr 2 is a universal app: install it on all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac, Vision Pro) with a single purchase. It’s fully accessible with VoiceOver, Voice Control, and more. Dark and Tinted icon variants are included. Family Sharing is supported. Because it’s developed by a single independent developer and 100% funded by its users, Wipr only answers to you: no one can pay to have their ads unblocked, and there are no “acceptable ads”. This app was made with love and patience. I hope you’ll enjoy using it as much as I enjoyed designing and building it. – Kaylee Terms & Conditions: https://kaylees.site/terms-and-conditions.html

entry.title: Bright Memory: Infinite
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$150.00 → $60.00 [$60.00 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

App 內購買

  • 活力四射套裝：$30.00
  • 元氣貓咪套裝：$30.00
  • 清涼假日套裝：$30.00
  • 青花禮服套裝：$30.00
  • 賽博兔皮膚：$30.00
  • 休閒牛仔套裝：$30.00
  • 青春魅力套裝：$30.00
  • 學院兔皮膚：$30.00
  • 新年禮服套裝：$30.00

应用描述

2036年世界各地的天空上突然出現了異象，一個巨型的黑洞出現天空中吞噬著山脈和古建築，科學家們無法解釋這些現象，隸屬於超自然科學研究組織隊員「覃舒雅」接到上級任務後前往事發地點進行調查，這事件背後牽連著世界的存亡，一段塵封的歷史將會被揭開。 第一人稱融合動作元素，操控不同風格的能力對敵人進行浮空連擊，使用你的近戰武器格擋，彈反敵人的招式破招，享受高速戰鬥的冒險之旅。多樣化的武器開火模式切換，灼熱傷害、黏性破片、反彈濺射、鎖定追蹤彈，總有一把適合你的武器，各式各樣的花式攻擊吧。

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Card.Note - 多彩卡片笔记
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Card.Note Premiun：$60.00 → $30.00 [$30.00 ~ $60.00]

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買

  • Card.Note Premiun：$30.00

应用描述

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录 这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。 你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。 你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒； 还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。 「Card.Note」九大特点： 1.极简设计 循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。 2.全局卡片化 充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。 3.全局手势化 下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。 4.语音录入 打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。 5.要事提醒： 可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。 6.快捷高效 支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。 7.文青定制 精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。 8.iCloud云同步 支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。 9.深色模式 全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。 感谢下载，生活愉快。 如有问题或建议，请联系开发者 微博：PoPoem开发者 邮箱：yande18@126.com

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

优惠信息（价格：$120.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $120.00]）

价格：免費

应用描述

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere. And there are reminders that you can never forget.

entry.title: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作
entry.id: 電影精靈 - 專業視頻編輯和電影製作-tw-1751119837389
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$320.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $320.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

您想製作屬於自己的微電影嗎？ 您想當導演、製片、主演……嗎？ 在電影精靈中，這些角色可以全部由您一個人搞定！ 通過電影精靈，您可以把各種媒體素材如視頻、照片、音樂、文字、錄音以及手指塗鴉等，按照您的創意，把它們編輯組合在一起，並給它們添加各種特效（場景切換特效、文字動畫、濾鏡特效、片頭、蒙版等），創作出屬於您自己的微電影。 主要功能： -可裁剪、分割、合併、縮放各種媒體素材 -疊加多層視頻（畫中畫效果），視頻數量沒有限制 -添加各種蒙版（線性蒙版、矩形蒙版、圓形蒙版、文字蒙版和路徑蒙版）來隱藏或者顯示影片的各個部分 -可摳圖（鋼筆工具、套索工具、塗抹工具和文字工具等自定義形狀摳圖工具） -快進、倒播視頻，給視頻添加慢動作鏡頭（1/12慢速至16倍速） - 360度旋轉影片 -多種混合影像模式 -各種字體、文字模版、文字顏色、表情符號、陰影、文字描邊等 -內寘多種風格的免費配樂和音效，可添加電腦上的音樂或者iTunes裏的音樂，還可選取匯出視頻裏的音訊 -給視頻配音錄音 -直接在影片上用手指繪畫塗鴉 -專業視頻比例，可縮放的時間線，無限制的軌道圖層 -簡單自動跟蹤功能 -添加移動式馬賽克 -自定義影片背景顏色 -可調整素材亮度、對比度、飽和度 -創建自己的Gif動畫 -私人定制特效片頭（需另外購買） -多達幾十種濾鏡特效（素描、漫畫、魚眼、放大鏡、顏色濾鏡等） -多達幾十種場景切換特效 -可給視頻／照片設定各種外觀如圓形、心形和鑽石等，甚至自定義獨一無二的形狀 -可設定疊加視頻／照片的透明色（Chroma Key），比如去除照片中純色背景色（綠幕藍幕摳像） -能把視頻／照片變黑白，把需要突出的部分還原色彩突出出來（Color Splash） -能自由變形視頻／照片成不規則形狀 -給視頻／照片／文字添加運動點，使它們動起來，縮放、旋轉和移動結合起來可創建出各種各樣的絢麗效果 -實时預覽，高分辨視頻輸出 -可通過Wi-Fi直接從電腦導入多媒體素材：視頻、照片、音樂和Gif動畫等 -可直接保存並分享影片到社交網絡，如雲盤、微信、QQ、抖音等 如果您有任何問題或迴響，請直接發郵件到verytools2006@gmail.com，我們會儘快答覆您。謝謝！

应用描述

在这款简约爽快的塔防射击游戏中，玩家将化身镇守城池的弓箭塔，直面敌方如火车般沿轨道袭来的攻城车队。敌军每节车厢均携带独立生命值，需通过精准瞄准与快速连射逐一击破——箭无虚发才能阻止其逼近城楼！若敌方车队突破防线抵达塔下，则宣告失败；全歼车厢则逆风翻盘！ 游戏以经典轨道推进玩法为核心，操作直观易上手：滑动瞄准、自动放箭，箭矢轨迹与攻速节奏考验你的临场反应。随着关卡推进，可强化弓箭手的攻击力、射速与暴击属性，体验“万箭齐发，摧枯拉朽”的畅快感！

  • Abstract Theme 1：$30.00
  • Gradient Bundle：$60.00
  • Gradient Purple Theme：$30.00
  • Nature Beach Night Theme：$30.00

应用描述

厭倦了一直重複輸入相同的響應？短語板通過易於訪問的短語對鍵盤進行自定義和分類。 添加一個類別和一些常用短語，您可以立即編輯，收聽和翻譯文本，然後在Facebook，Twitter，Instagram上共享它，或者僅通過電子郵件，LINE或SMS形式發送。 使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！ 超過100種創意字體可供選擇！ 可以翻譯超過59種語言！ 特徵： •具有創意字體的全鍵盤。 •創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。 •在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。 •更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。* •設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。* •將自定義照片設置為鍵盤背景。 •保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。 •選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。 •更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小 •將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。* •語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。* •使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。 •只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。 •商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！ 還： •在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。 •單擊即可共享您的位置。 •在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。* •從大量字體中選擇。* •自定義字體大小。* •自定義字體顏色。* •使用“安全”類別保護短語。 •使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。 •使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。 •直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。 •直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。 •創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。 •使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。 （*）需要有效的訂閱 記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。 （僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。 短語板高級訂閱信息 加入Phraseboard Premium可以進行3天的免費試用，然後每月收取會員費。 •訂閱會自動續訂，除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉了自動續訂功能。 •將在當前期間結束前的24小時內向帳戶收取續訂費用。 •訂閱可以由用戶管理，並且可以通過購買後轉到用戶的“帳戶設置”來關閉自動續訂。 •如果適用，則免費試用期中任何未使用的部分（如果提供）將在用戶購買訂閱時被沒收。 隱私政策：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/untitled-c82w 服務條款：https://phraseboard.wixsite.com/phraseboard/terms

应用描述

Jump, spin and smash your way into the sky as you battle Dr. Eggman with Sonic and his friends! Sonic Jump delivers brand new, arcade style adventures. Tilt and tap your way through Story levels and Arcade infinite modes. Visit new and classic Sonic levels for hours of fun. Challenge your friends across the world to see who can jump the farthest. PLAY WITH SONIC AND FRIENDS Play as Sonic or his friends Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Rouge, Silver and Blaze. Master each characters special abilities and attacks! AMAZING WORLDS Jump across the legendary Green Hill Zone or take to new worlds including Mountain, Jungle, Blue Sky & Mechanical Zones. STORY AND ARCADE MODES Leap through 48 different levels on a quest to stop the evil Dr. Eggman or Jump until you drop in the infinite Arcade Mode. FUN CHALLENGES AND QUESTS You gotta go fast to beat each level and win big. Every level and both game modes have special rewards for completing special missions. UNLOCK POWERFUL ABILITIES Collect rings as you play the game, or purchase them in store, to unlock characters, power ups and more. CHALLENGE THE WORLD Compete against players across the world to see who can jump highest in Arcade Mode or set epic scores on global leaderboards. CONSUMER REVIEWS - 4/4 “Whether you grew up with Sonic or not, Sonic Jump is a total blast.” - Slide to Play - 4/5 “The story mode and missions are the real draw… giving you a never-ending supply of reasons to keep jumping for the top.” - Digital Spy - 8/10 “Sonic Jump is an enjoyable little gem that took me by surprise.” - App Gamer - 4/5 “Sega has made Sonic Jump a proper standalone game well worth it for both fans, and non-fans of Sonic the Hedgehog.” - TouchGen - - - - - Privacy Policy: https://privacy.sega.com/en/sega-of-america-inc-privacy-policy Terms of Use: http://www.sega.com/terms Game apps are ad-supported and no in-app purchases are required to progress; ad-free play option available with in-app purchase. This game may include "Interest Based Ads" (please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#3IBADiscolure for more information)​ and may collect "Precise Location Data" ​(please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#5LocationDataDisclosure ​for more information)​. © SEGA. All rights reserved. SEGA, the SEGA logo, Sonic Jump™ are registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA CORPORATION or its affiliates.

entry.title: Ticket to Ride®
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Nordic Bundle：$290.00 → $220.00 [$220.00 ~ $290.00]

全部价格信息

价格：$150.00

App 內購買

  • Round the World Ticket：$990.00
  • Europe Expansion：$320.00
  • Europe Map：$290.00
  • LegendaryAsia Expansion Bundle：$220.00
  • 1910 Ticket Pack：$120.00
  • Nordic Bundle：$220.00
  • Pennsylvania Carriage B：$60.00
  • Pennsylvania Locomotive B：$60.00
  • Pennsylvania Locomotive A：$60.00
  • Pennsylvania Carriage A：$60.00

应用描述

Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days – we’ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play! Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic! HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDE®: Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map you’re playing on, but don’t worry – the AI takes care of this! Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route. When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! FEATURES A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play – use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session! PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY – Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days. SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$90.00 → $10.00 [$10.00 ~ $90.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$10.00

应用描述

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

全部价格信息

App 內購買

  • 8mm Pro：$300.00
  • 默片主題：$0.00
  • 炫光主題：$0.00
  • 倒計時主題：$0.00

应用描述

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS • Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies • Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style • 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm • 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes • Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription • Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes • Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. • Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

应用描述

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way · Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. · Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History · Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 · Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of · Manage all on-field decisions and strategies · Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses · Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase · Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team · Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world · Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users · Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available · Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year · Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more · 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation · Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale · KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation · Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about · Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. · Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" · And more! OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Officially Licensed Product – MLB Players, Inc. Out of the Park Developments © Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved * Access permission notice for gameplay · STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos. · MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM · PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls. · CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account. ※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above. "Consumer Information: • Language support: English, 한국어 • Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. • For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/. - Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1 - Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3 • For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting https://support.ootpdevelopments.com/portal/en/home

entry.title: PlayNav - 影片內無廣告！
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • 高級功能：$30.00 → $20.00 [$20.00 ~ $320.00]

全部价格信息

价格：$20.00

App 內購買

  • 高級功能：$20.00

应用描述

你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾 全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片 此外，我們的應用還提供你會喜歡的功能 • 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片 • 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻 • 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium） • 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium） • 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium） 此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓 如何使用 PlayNav 畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium) 在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它 如何啟用 1. 播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示） 2. 影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上 僅音頻模式 在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片 如何啟用 1. 啟用畫中畫播放 2. 然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放 自動關閉 睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡 如何啟用 1. 在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮） 2. 選擇自動關閉的時間 3. 可與僅音頻模式結合使用 循環模式（重複播放影片） 想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用 如何啟用 1. 點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉 學習模式（通過字幕學習語言） 現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞 如何啟用 1. 搜索你學習語言的影片 2. 影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕 – 現在試用 PLAYNAV！– 免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。 最低要求 • iOS 15 或更高版本 • 3G 或更快的網路連接 相關關鍵詞 YouTube、YouTube Music、YouTube Vanced、廣告攔截器、無需訂閱、跳過 YouTube 廣告、無廣告音樂、屏蔽彈窗、YouTube 的 AdBlock、屏蔽彈窗廣告、無廣告內容、高級廣告攔截器、AdBlock Plus、移除廣告、無廣告 YouTube 需要幫助 訪問 playnav.vidiom.app 或聯繫我們 info@playnav.vidiom.app 服務條款 playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service 隱私政策 playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: SkySafari 7 Pro
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$1,490.00 → $990.00 [$390.00 ~ $1,490.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$990.00

App 內購買

  • SkySafari Premium Monthly：$120.00
  • PGC Galaxy Database：$0.00
  • GAIA Star Database：$0.00
  • Apollo Lunar Missions：$0.00
  • SkySafari Premium：$990.00

应用描述

SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009. Here's what’s new in version 7: + Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience. + Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions. + Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device. + Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari. Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer. These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices. SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people. OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time. This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object. SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts. + Sky Tonight - jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight. Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects. + Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations. New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data. + Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips. The Small Touches: + You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings. + Better Moon Age calculation. + New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines. + Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free - this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy. + Many more. If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it: + Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more! + Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events. + Control your telescope, log and plan your observations. + Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com. + Augmented Reality (AR) mode + Night Vision. + Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system. + Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way! https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html
